verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> He Began <S%G756><s%> To Teach <S%G1321><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea. <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Crowd <S%G3793><s%> , Great, <S%G4183><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Having Entered <S%G1684><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> Sat <S%G2521><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Close <S%G4314><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Sea <S%G2281><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> Was. <S%G2258><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Taught <S%G1321><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Parables <S%G3850><s%> Many Things, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G3004><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Teaching <S%G1322><s%> His, <S%G846><s%>
Hearken : <S%G191><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Went Out <S%G1831><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sower <S%G4687><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Sow. <S%G4687><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1096><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4687><s%> As He Sowed, <S%G3739><s%> One <S%G3303><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way, <S%G3598><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Birds <S%G4071><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Devoured <S%G2719><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G243><s%> And Another <S%G1161><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rocky Place, <S%G4075><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Had Not <S%G2192><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Much, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> It Sprang Up, <S%G1816><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Because Of <S%G3361><s%> Not Having <S%G2192><s%> Depth <S%G899><s%> Of Earth; <S%G1093><s%>

<S%G2246><s%> And The Sun <S%G1161><s%> Having Arisen <S%G393><s%> It Was Scorched, <S%G2739><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Because Of <S%G3361><s%> Not Having <S%G2192><s%> Root <S%G4491><s%> It Withered Away. <S%G3583><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> Among <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thorns, <S%G173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Grew Up <S%G305><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thorns, <S%G173><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Choked <S%G4846><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Yielded Not. <S%G1325><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Fell <S%G4098><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ground <S%G1093><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good, <S%G2570><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Yielded <S%G1325><s%> Fruit, <S%G2590><s%> Growing Up <S%G305><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Increasing, <S%G837><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bore <S%G5342><s%> One <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Thirty, <S%G5144><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Sixty, <S%G1835><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1520><s%> A Hundred. <S%G1540><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G3004><s%> , To Them, <S%G846><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%> To Hear <S%G191><s%> Let Him Hear. <S%G191><s%>

<S%G3753><s%> And When <S%G1161><s%> He Was <S%G1096><s%> , Alone, <S%G2651><s%> Asked <S%G2065><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve As To <S%G1427><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parable. <S%G3850><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G3004><s%> To Them. <S%G846><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Has Been Given <S%G1325><s%> To Know <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mystery <S%G3466><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God : <S%G2316><s%> <S%G1565><s%> But To Those <S%G1161><s%> Who Are <S%G3588><s%> Without, <S%G1854><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Parables <S%G3850><s%> <S%G3588><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> Are Done, <S%G1096><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> Seeing <S%G991><s%> They May See, <S%G991><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Perceive; <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hearing <S%G191><s%> They May Hear, <S%G191><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Understand, <S%G4920><s%> Lest <S%G3379><s%> They Should Be Converted, <S%G1994><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Should Be Forgiven <S%G863><s%> Them Their <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sins. <S%G265><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Perceive Ye Not <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3850><s%> This Parable? <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parables <S%G3850><s%> Will Ye Know? <S%G1097><s%>
The <S%G3588><s%> Sower <S%G4687><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Sows. <S%G4687><s%>

<S%G3778><s%> And These <S%G1161><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> They <S%G3588><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way, <S%G3598><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> Is Sown <S%G4687><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> They Hear, <S%G191><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Takes Away <S%G142><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Sown <S%G4687><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Their Hearts. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> In Like Manner <S%G3668><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Rocky Places <S%G4075><s%> Are Sown, <S%G4687><s%> Who, <S%G3739><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> They Hear <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Receive <S%G2983><s%> It, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Have Not <S%G2192><s%> Root <S%G4491><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Temporary <S%G4340><s%> Are; <S%G1526><s%> Then <S%G1534><s%> Having Arisen <S%G1096><s%> Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Persecution <S%G1375><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> They Are Offended. <S%G4624><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Among <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Thorns <S%G173><s%> Are Sown, <S%G4687><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Hear, <S%G191><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cares <S%G3308><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> , Of This Life <S%G5127><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Deceit <S%G539><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Riches <S%G4149><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Other Things <S%G3062><s%> Desires <S%G1939><s%> Entering In <S%G1531><s%> Choke <S%G4846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Unfruitful <S%G175><s%> It Becomes. <S%G1096><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ground <S%G1093><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> Have Been Sown, <S%G4687><s%> Such As <S%G3748><s%> Hear <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Receive It, <S%G3858><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bring Forth Fruit, <S%G2592><s%> One <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Thirty, <S%G5144><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1520><s%> Sixty, <S%G1835><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> One <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1520><s%> A Hundred. <S%G1540><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Them, <S%G3385><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lamp <S%G3088><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Corn Measure <S%G3426><s%> It May Be Put <S%G5087><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Couch? <S%G2825><s%> Is It Not <S%G3756><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lampstand <S%G3087><s%> It May Be Put? <S%G2007><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> For Not <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> <S%G2927><s%> Hidden, <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> It Should Be Made Manifest, <S%G5319><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Has Taken Place <S%G1096><s%> A Secret Thing, <S%G614><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Light <S%G5318><s%> It Should Come. <S%G2064><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> Ears <S%G3775><s%> To Hear, <S%G191><s%> Let Him Hear. <S%G191><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Take Heed <S%G991><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Ye Hear : <S%G191><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Measure <S%G3358><s%> Ye Mete <S%G3354><s%> It Shall Be Measured <S%G3354><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Be Added <S%G4369><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Hear; <S%G191><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For Whoever <S%G302><s%> , May Have, <S%G2192><s%> Shall Be Given <S%G1325><s%> To Him; <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Who <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Has Not, <S%G2192><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> That Which <S%G3739><s%> He Has <S%G2192><s%> Shall Be Taken <S%G142><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said, <S%G3004><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Should Cast <S%G906><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seed <S%G4703><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Should Sleep <S%G2518><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Rise <S%G1453><s%> Night <S%G3571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Day, <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seed <S%G4703><s%> Should Sprout <S%G985><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Lengthened <S%G3373><s%> How <S%G5613><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Knows Not <S%G1492><s%> He; <S%G846><s%>

Of Itself <S%G844><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Brings Forth Fruit, <S%G2592><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> A Blade, <S%G5528><s%> Then <S%G1534><s%> An Ear, <S%G4719><s%> Then <S%G1534><s%> Full <S%G4134><s%> Corn <S%G4621><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ear. <S%G4719><s%>

<S%G3752><s%> And When <S%G1161><s%> Offers Itself <S%G3860><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fruit, <S%G2590><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> He Sends <S%G649><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sickle, <S%G1407><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> Has Come <S%G3936><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Harvest. <S%G2326><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said, <S%G3004><s%> To What <S%G5101><s%> Shall We Liken <S%G3666><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God? <S%G2316><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> What <S%G4169><s%> Parable <S%G3850><s%> Shall We Compare <S%G3846><s%> It? <S%G846><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> To A Grain <S%G2848><s%> Of Mustard, <S%G4615><s%> Which, <S%G3739><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> It Has Been Sown <S%G4687><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%> Less <S%G3398><s%> Than All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seeds <S%G4690><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Which Are <S%G3588><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth, <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> It Has Been Sown, <S%G4687><s%> It Grows Up, <S%G305><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Becomes <S%G1096><s%> Than All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Herbs <S%G3001><s%> Greater, <S%G3187><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Produces <S%G4160><s%> Branches <S%G2798><s%> Great, <S%G3173><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> Are Able <S%G1410><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Shadow <S%G4639><s%> Of It <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Birds <S%G4071><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> To Roost. <S%G2681><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> With Such <S%G5108><s%> Parables <S%G3850><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> He Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> They Were Able <S%G1410><s%> To Hear, <S%G191><s%>

<S%G5565><s%> But Without <S%G1161><s%> A Parable <S%G3850><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Spoke He Not <S%G2980><s%> <S%G846><s%> ' To Them; <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> And Apart <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples <S%G846><s%> He Explained <S%G1956><s%> All Things. <S%G3956><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Day, <S%G2250><s%> Evening <S%G3798><s%> Being Come, <S%G1096><s%> Let Us Pass Over <S%G1330><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other Side. <S%G4008><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Dismissed <S%G863><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> They Take With Them <S%G3880><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship; <S%G4143><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Other <S%G243><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Small Ships <S%G4142><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Comes <S%G1096><s%> A Storm <S%G2978><s%> Of Wind <S%G417><s%> Violent, <S%G3173><s%> <S%G3588><s%> And The <S%G1161><s%> Waves <S%G2949><s%> Beat <S%G1911><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship, <S%G4143><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Was Filled. <S%G1072><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> He <S%G846><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stern <S%G4403><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cushion <S%G4344><s%> Sleeping. <S%G2518><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Arouse <S%G1326><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is It No Concern <S%G3199><s%> To Thee <S%G4671><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> We Perish? <S%G622><s%>
